verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, that <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%> had a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, which was in <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>, hard <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H1964>palace<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H5022>Naboth<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> me thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, that I may have it for a <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H3419>herbs<s%>, because it is <S%H7138>near<s%> <S%H681>unto<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%>: and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee for it a <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> than it; or, if it seem <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H5869>thee<s%>, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H4242>worth<s%> of it in <S%H3701>money<s%>.

And <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H256>Ahab<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2486>forbid<s%> it me, that I should <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%> unto thee.

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5620>heavy<s%> and <S%H2198>displeased<s%> because of the <S%H1697>word<s%> which <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to him: for he had <S%H559>said<s%>, I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%>. And he laid him <S%H7901>down<s%> upon his <S%H4296>bed<s%>, and turned <S%H5437>away<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and would <S%H398>eat<s%> no <S%H3899>bread<s%>.

¶ But <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to him, and <S%H1696>said<s%> unto him, Why is thy <S%H7307>spirit<s%> so <S%H5620>sad<s%>, that thou <S%H398>eatest<s%> no <S%H3899>bread<s%>?

And he <S%H1696>said<s%> unto her, Because I <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H5414>Give<s%> me thy <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> for <S%H3701>money<s%>; or else, if it <S%H2655>please<s%> thee, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee another <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> for it: and he <S%H559>answered<s%>, I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> thee my <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>.

And <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Dost thou now <S%H6213>govern<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? <S%H6965>arise<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and let thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H3190>merry<s%>: I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%>.

So she <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> in <S%H256>Ahab's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> them with his <S%H2368>seal<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H5612>letters<s%> unto the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and to the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> that were in his <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H3427>dwelling<s%> with <S%H5022>Naboth<s%>.

And she <S%H3789>wrote<s%> in the <S%H5612>letters<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7121>Proclaim<s%> a <S%H6685>fast<s%>, and <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> on <S%H7218>high<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>:

And <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial<s%>, before him, to bear <S%H5749>witness<s%> against him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou didst <S%H1288>blaspheme<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>. And then carry him <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H5619>stone<s%> him, that he may <S%H4191>die<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%>, even the <S%H2205>elders<s%> and the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> who were the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> in his <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto them, and as it was <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>letters<s%> which she had <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto them.
They <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> a <S%H6685>fast<s%>, and <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> on <S%H7218>high<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And there <S%H935>came<s%> in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial<s%>, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> before him: and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial<s%> <S%H5749>witnessed<s%> against him, even against <S%H5022>Naboth<s%>, in the presence of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> did <S%H1288>blaspheme<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>. Then they carried him <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H5619>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%>, that he <S%H4191>died<s%>.
Then they <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H348>Jezebel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> is <S%H5619>stoned<s%>, and is <S%H4191>dead<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, when <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> was <S%H5619>stoned<s%>, and was <S%H4191>dead<s%>, that <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H256>Ahab<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, take <S%H3423>possession<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%>, which he <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> thee for <S%H3701>money<s%>: for <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> is not <S%H2416>alive<s%>, but <S%H4191>dead<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> was <S%H4191>dead<s%>, that <S%H256>Ahab<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> the <S%H3158>Jezreelite<s%>, to take <S%H3423>possession<s%> of it.
¶ And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which is in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>: behold, he is in the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%>, whither he is gone <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Hast thou <S%H7523>killed<s%>, and also taken <S%H3423>possession<s%>? And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, In the <S%H4725>place<s%> where <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H3952>licked<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H5022>Naboth<s%> shall <S%H3611>dogs<s%> <S%H3952>lick<s%> thy <S%H1818>blood<s%>, even thine.

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah<s%>, Hast thou <S%H4672>found<s%> me, O mine <S%H341>enemy<s%>? And he <S%H559>answered<s%>, I have <S%H4672>found<s%> thee: because thou hast <S%H4376>sold<s%> thyself to <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

Behold, I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon thee, and will take <S%H1197>away<s%> thy <S%H310>posterity<s%>, and will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H256>Ahab<s%> him that <S%H8366>pisseth<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and him that is shut <S%H6113>up<s%> and <S%H5800>left<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

And will <S%H5414>make<s%> thine <S%H1004>house<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%>, and like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H281>Ahijah<s%>, for the <S%H3708>provocation<s%> wherewith thou hast provoked me to <S%H3707>anger<s%>, and made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%>.

And of <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> also <S%H1696>spake<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> by the <S%H2426>wall<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>.

Him that <S%H4191>dieth<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%>; and him that <S%H4191>dieth<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%>.

¶ But there was none like unto <S%H256>Ahab<s%>, which did <S%H4376>sell<s%> himself to <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, whom <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> stirred <S%H5496>up<s%>.

And he did <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H8581>abominably<s%> in <S%H3212%H310>following<s%> <S%H1544>idols<s%>, according to all things as <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> cast <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> those <S%H1697>words<s%>, that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> upon his <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and <S%H6684>fasted<s%>, and <S%H7901>lay<s%> in <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H328>softly<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H7200>Seest<s%> thou how <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H3665>humbleth<s%> himself <S%H6440>before<s%> me? <S%H3282>because<s%> he <S%H3665>humbleth<s%> himself <S%H6440>before<s%> me, I will not <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> in his <S%H3117>days<s%>: but in his <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon his <S%H1004>house<s%>.
